sentence.Network_en: Huniphrey sat uncomfortably in the hardbacked witness chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 汉弗莱不舒服地坐在证人的硬座椅上.

it was a hardback copy of The Wasteland . on the flyleaf was an inscription to me . for once talkative life , I was speechless .那是一本精装本的《荒原》。在扉页上题字是送给我的。我有生以来头一次哑口无言了。
